ghomala_to_english.hyà: caring for newborn babies and their mothers
ghomala_to_english.nyà: natural features of the human body
ghomala_to_english.cofoshe': title for servants who do not enter the fv:faâm
ghomala_to_english.s3m: not having a share in a partition
ghomala_to_english.ju': a cucurbit whose seeds are prized
ghomala_to_english.bû̀'gùŋ: liberator of the land of the world
ghomala_to_english.bêbàŋ: the one who stops the rain
ghomala_to_english.sòtà: stirring up the quarrel on several occasions
ghomala_to_english.pfaá: eat hard food of a firm consistency
ghomala_to_english.zàtà: be at the end of your rope
ghomala_to_english.sùŋ: remove something from a set or a whole
ghomala_to_english.cáptà: sketch out the sounds or steps of a well-known dance
ghomala_to_english.lăm: hurt when it comes to the stomach
ghomala_to_english.mkamvu'u: full member of the council of nine notables
ghomala_to_english.sŭ'tá: the part of the bamboo that attaches to the trunk
ghomala_to_english.gû: the one who carries a heavy load
ghomala_to_english.wabo: title; man-buffalo, great dignitaries of the kingdom and members of totemic societies; they enter the tv:faâm
ghomala_to_english.kśmt3́: grasp in the palm of the hand
ghomala_to_english.mà': make or give a gift after a purchase
ghomala_to_english.lényó: look at each other from time to time
ghomala_to_english.dúlà: one unit corresponding to five francs
ghomala_to_english.dz3́dzə: first day of the traditional week
ghomala_to_english.sónyá: being away from home late at night
ghomala_to_english.ŋòm: be scary because of the way they look
ghomala_to_english.ŋwala'sisí: fv:ñwala' 'from above' is the high priest
ghomala_to_english.káréyà: all-purpose boy and especially hard labor
ghomala_to_english.khú': magic to find a long-lost or hidden object
ghomala_to_english.mcî: water dripping from roofs at night
ghomala_to_english.tajya: title; in charge of one of bandjoun's seven divisions, commanding district chiefs and vassal chiefs
ghomala_to_english.syà2: remove husks from certain fruits (corn, beans)

ghomala_to_french.dúlà: une unité correspondant à cinq francs
ghomala_to_french.káréyà: boy à tout faire et surtout les travaux forcés
ghomala_to_french.dz3́dzə: premier jour de la semaine traditionnelle

ghomala_to_french.ŋòm: être effrayant à cause du physique

fulfulde_to_english.ngaggaawu: peanuts, which yield three to four seeds per shell
